about.title: About Me
about.position: SDE III At PayPal | BITS Pilani
about.description: Hi üëã, I'm Shivesh. A passionate full stack developer from India with 6+ years of experience building cloud native microservices, web and mobile native apps. Post-graduated in Software Engineering from BITS (M. Tech) and Graduated in Electronics and Communication Engineering from GGSIPU (B. Tech). Do checkout some cool open source hobby projects I have built over the years down below.
about.quote: "A good engineer always looks both ways before crossing a one-way street."
